ovdesc.p: The screen is used to handle the payments that are moved to Risk filter queue with status 625 and to do breaching the risk filter conditions.
Payment form Risk Filter queue can be approved and allow to proceed further or Reject and moved to Repair status

desc.p: This field is a no input filed. System will populate the current value the Maximum number of payments allowed for a week specified in the respective Risk Filter confition.
This field is a no input filed. System will calculate the current number of payments by which the PaymentsPerDay is breached.
This field is a no input filed. System will calculate the current number of payments by which the PaymentsPerMonth is breached.
This field is a no input filed. System will calculate the current number of payments by which the PaymentsPerWeek is breached.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the current value transaction amount limit per transaction defined in the respective risk filter condition.
This field is a no input filed. System will calculate the current transaction amount by which the TransactionAmount is breached.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the current cumulative Weekly amount limit defined in the respective risk filter condition.
This field is a no input filed. System will calculate the curren transaction amount by which the WeeklyAmountLimit is breached.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the daily amount limit defined in the respective risk filter condition while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the amount by which the DailyAmountLimit is breached while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.

Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide the user with a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the DebitValueDate from the payment order.
Specifies unique ID of the Risk filter condition for which with the payment breached the condition .
Specifies the unique ID of the breached payment.
Specifies the Unique ID generated by the Payments Hub.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the cumulative monthly amount limitdefined in the respective risk filter condition while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the amount by which the MonthlyAmountLimit is breached while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the previous live record of store table.
This field can hold upto 65 alphanumeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.

Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide the user with a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the Maximum number of payments allowed for a day defined in the respective risk filter condition while moving the payment to Risk filter queue..
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the Maximum number of payments allowed for a month defined in the respective risk filter condition while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
Indicates the company ID of the limit breached payment.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the Maximum number of payments allowed for a week defined in the respective risk filter condition while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the number by which the PaymentsPerDay is breached while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the number by which the PaymentsPerMonth is breached while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the number by which the PaymentsPerWeek is breached while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
Spcifies the transaction amount of hte breached payment.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the transaction amount limit per transaction defined in the respective risk filter condition while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
Specifies the payment Currency Code of the breached payment.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the amount by which the TransactionAmount is breached while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the cumulative weekly amount limit defined in the respective risk filter condition while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the amount by which the WeeklyAmountLimit is breached while moving the payment to Risk filter queue.
Specifies the CreditValueDate from the breached payment order.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the current daily amount limit specified in the respective Risk Filter condition
This field is a no input filed. System will calculate the current number of payments by which the DailyLimitBreach is breached.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the current cumulative Monthly amount limit specified in the respective Risk Filter condition
This field is a no input filed. System will calculate the current amount by which the MonthlyAmountLimit is breached.
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the current Maximum number of payments allowed for a day specified in the respective Risk Filter condition
This field is a no input filed. System will populate the current Maximum number of payments allowed for a month specified in the respective Risk Filter condition.
